segments.text: Doctor , what is the best way to stay healthy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Having a good diet is probably the most important thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is very confusing to know what to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need plenty of fruits and vegetables , small amounts of protein , and whole grains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there certain things that I should avoid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You shouldn ’ t consume too much sugar or caffeine . Also , watch your intake of fatty food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After watching my diet , what else should I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to stop smoking , and make sure that you get 30 minutes of exercise every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a glass of wine now and then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As long as you don ’ t overdo it , a glass of wine a day should be OK .
segments.speaker: S2
